meanings.definition: Scultches (noun): crutches used for support while walking
meanings.sent1: After his injury, he relied on scultches to help him walk.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided him with a pair of scultches to aid his mobility.
meanings.sent3: The scultches leaned against the wall, waiting to assist the next patient.
meanings.sent4: Her scultches were like loyal companions, supporting her every step of the way.
meanings.sent5: The scultches creaked softly as he made his way down the hallway.

meanings.definition: Scultches (verb): to walk with the assistance of crutches
meanings.sent1: She scultches carefully across the room, mindful of her balance.
meanings.sent2: He scultches slowly down the hallway, taking each step with caution.
meanings.sent3: The penguin scultches awkwardly on the ice, trying to keep its balance.
meanings.sent4: With determination, he scultches his way up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The injured athlete scultches towards the finish line, refusing to give up.
